title: Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
February 11, 2016

 



Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate





	NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:

	Abdul K. Kallon, of Alabama, to be United States Circuit Judge for the Eleventh Circuit, vice Joel F. Dubina, retired.

	John B. King, of New York, to be Secretary of Education, vice Arne Duncan.
